summary: Internal email regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell, noting that video of a briefing by the US Attorney's Office and FBI has not yet been uploaded to their official YouTube channel but is available via NBC News and CBS. The email references remarks by Audrey Strauss and Bill Sweeney.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the arrest briefing mentioned in the email; her arrest is the topic of the video being discussed.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Made remarks during the briefing about Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest; referenced as 'Audrey' in the email.

persons.name: Bill Sweeney
persons.context: Made remarks during the briefing about Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest; his full remarks are noted in the available video.

connections.description: Both gave official remarks at the same press briefing regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell, representing the US Attorney's Office and FBI respectively.
Strauss, as a US Attorney, was involved in the legal proceedings and public announcement of Maxwell's arrest.
Sweeney, as an FBI official, was involved in the law enforcement action and public announcement of Maxwell's arrest.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Arrest Briefing
events.description: US Attorney's Office and FBI held a press briefing regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. Remarks were given by Audrey Strauss and Bill Sweeney.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested, prompting an official briefing by the US Attorney's Office and the FBI.
The briefing featured remarks from US Attorney Audrey Strauss and FBI Assistant Director Bill Sweeney.
The internal email indicates the official office YouTube channel had not yet uploaded the video, but it was available via NBC News and CBS.
